title: Front-End Developer

description: Document all projects relating to the development of the BMS. Ensures ALL documentation is current and easily replicated for all relevant parties. Programming the ATTiny85 chip with Digispark. Developing and designing smart batteries that are easily scalable and able to manage themselves.
